title: Bribri - Genesis (Book)
description: Bribri translation of the Book of Genesis. The Bribri are indigenous people of the Talamanca region, living in the mountains and Caribbean coastal areas of Costa Rica and Northern Panama.

language.name: Bribri
language.area: South, Limón Province, Canton of Talamanca, along Lari, Telire, Uren rivers; Puntarenas Province, Canton of Buenos Aires.
